      • GenerateRandomStatBonus

        public static StatBonus GenerateRandomStatBonus(double min,
                                                double max,
                                                java.lang.String type)
        Method builds a random stat bonus, with a bonus between double min and double max the type of card is determined.
        Parameters:
        min - is the minimum stat bonus that will be applied
        max - is the maxmimum stat bonus that will be applied
        type - is the type of stat that will be affected
        Returns:
        a random stat bonus
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in the event of something going horribly wrong

      • GenerateRandomStatBonus

        Method builds a random stat bonus, with a bonus between double min and double max the type of card is random, either attack defense or mobility

        max - is the maxmimum stat bonus that will be applied
        Returns:
        a random stat bonus
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in the event of something going horribly wrong
